name: Copy Machine
description:
Copy Machine is the first track of the Off-Score project, an interactive music album.

As you play through the game, the music and lyrics will guide you through the world of a copy machine and help you unveil the story behind the song.

Credits

Music, composition & voice - YenTing Lo

Art, game design - Vanja Mrgan

Programming, game design - Ferran Bertomeu Castells

Drums, recording & mixing - Ido Zilberman
Bass Guitar - Robert Rebane
Keyboard - Jetse de Jong
Guitar - Alisdair Pickering
